Author: Charlie Croom <ccroom@twitter.com>
Date:   Tue Aug 20 11:59:17 2013 -0700

    Refactor DMs code, add test, make profile DMs open convo view.
    
    This moves all the code from MessagesThreadFragment into a new
    fragment (MessagesComposeFragment) and the MessagesThreadActivity.
    In addition, clicking 'Send DM' from a users profile page with whom
    you already have a conversation will now take you directly to the
    conversation. Added a test for that functionality.

testDMPreselectedUserWithUserIdAndUserna.created_commit_log:
commit e45784bf5da43efa98abe9096acee934051f115d
Author: Michael Shafrir <mshafrir@twitter.com>
Date:   Thu Feb 20 17:10:14 2014 -0800

    Handle alternative DM URLs and small DM updates.
    
    We already support `messages` and `compose/dm/*` in app,
    but we need to also support the following routes:
    
    - direct_messages
    - direct_messages/create/*
    
    These are routes found in DM notification emails.
    
    DMs now support DMing a user with username only. Initiating
    DM composition through UrlInterpreterActivity should work
    even when the device is offline.
    
    Change-Id: I58332bfe4403dd8915ba59530726ca9cb6f2c0bb
    Jira-Id: ANDROID-6266

testDMPreselectedUserWithUserIdAndUserna.modified_commit_log:
commit de8d06d9ae37107b2facfbd3cc82f54129e08aa9
Author: Michael Shafrir <mshafrir@twitter.com>
Date:   Mon Mar 10 14:46:20 2014 -0700

    Better support for opening & replying to DM emails in app.
    
    If a user id was provided
    (e.g. /direct_messages/create/jack?user_id=12), handle in app.
    DM email notification links now include the user_id param.
    
    If a user id was not provided (e.g. /direct_messages/create/jack),
    send to web. Old DM email notification links did not include the
    user_id param.
    
    When the DM is opened via an email, fetch sent & received messages
    to ensure that the DMs are up to date.
    
    To test, enable android_email_tap_to_app_1786 experiment.
    
    Change-Id: I25688d35acf642064ce5b136a24ede8245076fe1

    Remove DMInboxActivity

    for adding tablet support to new DMs.

    of the Inbox, Compose and Conversation fragments. The management

testEditProfileActivityDefaultCancel.name: testEditProfileActivityDefaultCancel
testEditProfileActivityDefaultCancel.created_commit_log:
commit 8d083fc92c95ec9bddd8bdc140d0c0126d2f80c1
Author: Pavan Piratla <ppiratla@twitter.com>
Date:   Tue Feb 5 23:57:43 2013 -0800

    Adds EditProfileActivityTest and CategoriesActivityTest.
    
    EditProfileActivity updates the profile and verifies that the profile is
    indeed updated. It reverts back to the original profile and verifies
    that the profile is restored.
    
    SULActivity test opens up Browse categories and verifies that we show a
    minimum of atleast one image for each category in the list. This is just
    a sanity check, since we do not control the categories.
    
    Change-Id: I9a85a9b3ef8f373307f81ed95a975541102bdfb4

commit 42c9542d5d293d55144994497d8b74f95aa23519
Author: vsamala <vsamala@twitter.com>
Date:   Mon Aug 12 14:36:53 2013 -0700

    Add tests for conversations in timeline.
    
    This commit adds the test cases for the folowing scenarios:
    1) Test to verify conversation without connector in portrait mode.
    2) Test to verify conversation without conector in landscape mode.
    3) Test to verify conversation with connector in portrait mode.
    4) Test to verify conversation with connector in landscape mode.
    
    Change-Id: I4424611bdcec783ea993c6e0c202f03e3766c178
testConversationsWithConnectorInPortrait.modified_commit_log:
commit 400a317c43e127b6a8a7af3822901191856abed5
Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Thu Jun 5 21:05:59 2014 -0700

    Fix and rewrite ConversationsTest to use Espresso.
    
    This change also adds the following APIs:
      Tweet Matchers:
      - tweetWithRenderedContent
      - tweetIsConversationAncestor
      - tweetIsConversationFocalPoint
      - tweetIsReply
    
      View Matchers:
      - hasFollowingSibling
      - hasFollowingSiblings
      - hasPrecedingSibling
      - hasPrecedingSiblings
    
      View Actions:
      - rotateToPortrait
      - rotateToLandscape
    
    Change-Id: I9de4d87e3831a22035c2d78e406b21919f34eaa9
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-375

testOwnProfileTweets.created_commit_log:
commit 78f2899e21b5e082a502d381b9beb94193a1927c
Author: Saud Khan <skhan@twitter.com>
Date:   Thu May 22 15:02:40 2014 -0700

    Split profile activity test in multiple smaller tests.
    
    Also add a test for the owner timeline.
    
    Change-Id: Iefdd4ced72bf00947c6259070a0eaade4ef0af94
testOwnProfileTweets.modified_commit_log:
commit d2e5629eab25ecc2324c52c4fc369ef1b9b44e15
Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Jun 18 01:53:17 2014 -0700

    Make the ensure user login setUp more customizable.
    
    Rename getUserNameToLogIn() from TwitterUiInstrumentationTestCase
    and TwitterActivityInstrumentation to getUsersToLogIn() and change
    the return type from String to List<TestAccount>. This allows tests
    the capability of ensuring that more than one test account is
    logged in.
    
    Introduce InitialLoginState enum and allow tests the capability of
    ensuring that all users are logged out during setUp().
    
    Change-Id: I14d239b8ed549a577c4109e4bb6b814f82acbdfe
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-414

testDiscardingDraft.name: testDiscardingDraft

lines.line_content: 205)        // Type a Tweet message and then discard it
213)        // Make sure it's not in the drafts view

testDiscardingDraft.created_commit_log:
commit 079c67a2bef8eb5892d0a4b7270dacfb055a98eb
Author: Jess Garms <jgarms@twitter.com>
Date:   Mon May 19 09:31:58 2014 -0700

    Auto-save tweet from composer.
    
    Automatically save a tweet into the drafts database before the user
    exits the composer. This change triggers a save once the user has typed
    something into the composer, and then saves again when the activity is
    stopped.
    
    Change-Id: I600d37b2f26b4b4da1934a57b3cee532f91d8671
    Jira-Id: ANDROID-6443
testDiscardingDraft.modified_commit_log:
commit 97e9891da84e2dae50f1489c4b774434ae64e5d6
Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Jun 25 17:31:02 2014 -0700

    Rewrite DraftSaveTest to use Espresso.
    
    This change adds the following Espresso-related APIs:
    
    DataInteraction:
    - onDraftsData
    
    Matcher:
    - draftWithContent
    
    AdapterViewProtocol:
    - TwitterAdapterViewProtocols.draftsAdapterViewProtocol()
    
    ItemAdapter:
    - DraftsItemAdapter
    
    Change-Id: I8815d82f351c58aa11591398758d597d17dbc74c
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-469

Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Tue Jun 10 13:26:32 2014 -0700

    Rewrite ListsActivityTest to use Espresso.
    
    New DataInteractions:
    - onListsData()
    - onSearchSuggestionsData()
    
    New ItemAdapters:
    - ListsItemAdapter
    - SearchSuggestionsItemAdapter
    
    New Matchers:
    - listWithName
    - suggestedUserWithScreenName
    - suggestedUserWithUserName
    
    New ViewAction:
    - enterTypeAheadText
    
    This change also modifies ProfileActivityTest#testOwnProfileLists
    so that it uses onListsData() instead of onData().
    
    This change also records all the HTTP responses to prevent rate
    limiting with Lists.
    
    Change-Id: Ifdd95f069f809ecf15898083d04f76cbd5e4d98e
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-383

    Adds automated coverage tests for various settings activities.
    
    This change is to add automated coverage for various low pri settings
    activities which lack functional coverage at this point. The test will
    open each of the activity, waits for it to load, verifies the title.

    devices and different languages. We will add functional tests for each
    of these activities later.

testOpenNotificationSettingsActivityFrom.created_commit_log:
commit dfcc4dc0398e884a4defe9791568de6a9a2b25d2
Author: Noel Mansour <nmansour@twitter.com>
Date:   Tue Feb 25 14:46:45 2014 -0800

    Improve account and notification settings.
    
    - Remove misleading checkbox for notification settings.
    - Move notification indicator settings (vibrate, ringtone, LED) into
      notification settings.
    - Reorder settings in account settings to move notifications up.
    - Add subtitle to notifications in account settings to indicate whether
      or not notifications are enabled.
    - Fix debug PushSettingsSummaryPreference style.
    - Remove unnecessary settings category when setting screen only contains
      one category (security screen).
    - Remove lifeline alerts from non-GCM push notifications settings since
      they're not implemented.
    
    There is still more to be done (add a switch to the action bar to match
    ICS style preferences for notifications, clean up the root settings,
    move debug settings out into the overflow) but this is the first step.
    
    Change-Id: Iadd4d3d6c2a373ac417810b380de2ad1081b668f
    Jira-Id: ANDROID-5590
testOpenNotificationSettingsActivityFrom.modified_commit_log:

Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Jun 18 01:53:17 2014 -0700

    Rename getUserNameToLogIn() from TwitterUiInstrumentationTestCase
    and TwitterActivityInstrumentation to getUsersToLogIn() and change
    the return type from String to List<TestAccount>. This allows tests

Author: Pavan Piratla <ppiratla@twitter.com>
Date:   Mon Mar 25 13:29:43 2013 -0700

    Adds automated coverage tests for various settings activities.
    
    This change is to add automated coverage for various low pri settings

testCancel.name: testCancel
testCancel.created_commit_log:
commit a49b8d6920403212f470cd407c7d9dbf8353e6e6
Author: Ider <ider@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Jul 9 17:15:38 2014 -0700

    Instrumentation test for SingleSignOnActivity
    
    SingleSignOnActivity is used for third part app to request token and
    user information. Those data returned as activity result.
    This test is testing the result code and data is correct with certain
    user action.
    When user cancel the request, it should return CANCEL code with no data;
    when user allow it, the data should contain id and screen name of user,
    token and secret for access to Twitter.
    
    MockCallingActivity can be used as calling activity to send request
    to target activity, it saves the return results for assertion.
    
    Change-Id: I3b9248339d86707b749ff9d6132e4f96dfca8889
    Jira-Id: ANDROID-8143

testPromoImageApp.name: testPromoImageApp
testPromoImageApp.created_commit_log:
commit 2997d37b63b8c1b592b37c47c6b9a6bfc7813e03
Author: Steve Kojder <skojder@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed May 21 17:02:14 2014 -0700

    Implement basic cards UI smoke tests.
    
    Implement a basic suite of cards UI smoke tests. These tests look for a card
    to be visible and have non-zero size, for each type of first-party card that we
    support.
    
    Includes the following changes:
    * Add ElementHolder interface (to allow access of an Element via an Element
      view)
    * Simplify withElement() matcher to utilize ElementHolder
    * Add withNonZeroSize() View matcher
    * Add withClass() Element matcher
    
    Change-Id: Id3092a444f45686a2f3c16441d73939c7b32cf1d
    Jira-Id: CCAN-569
testPromoImageApp.modified_commit_log:
commit 2629430480971e42ad70e8dae9316dbc4e41bf31
Author: Steve Kojder <skojder@twitter.com>
Date:   Mon Jun 30 16:19:47 2014 -0700

    Update cards coverage tests.
    
    Includes the following updates:
    - Disable match status element check for world cup match cards
      (this is disabled on the server side, but may be enabled again later)
    - Use instrumentation target context, instead of instrumentation context
    - Incorporate improved activity monitor logic (copied from cards Echidna tests)
    - Reduce testing detail for revenue cards (revenue team tests for specifics)
    - Test for specific CTA state with promo_app cards
    - Fix revenue app_player CTA test
    
    Change-Id: Ifb68ab50888e3ed54046ff6c44cfd67e9d77d6fd

testAmplify.modified_commit_log:
commit 705362c68c574d8cdb9c2da585fd55bba36e9740
Author: Steve Kojder <skojder@twitter.com>
Date:   Thu Jun 5 16:46:08 2014 -0700

    Update cards coverage tests (includes interactivity refactor).
    
    Add new cards coverage tests for World Cup cards and add a new coverage test for
    the forward LeadGen card.
    
    Includes the following changes:
    * Add tests for the following cards:
      - forward:forward_world_cup_match
      - world_cup_match
      - forward:forward_world_cup_timeline
      - world_cup_timeline
      - forward:forward_promotion (aka forward LeadGen card)
    * Refactor test harness to allow for interactivity checks. This affects all
      existing tests
    * For world_cup_timeline cards, check to see that the search activity is
      launched when either the card preview image or summary text is clicked on
    * Fix forward_promo_image_app and promo_image_app CTA checks
    * Add some matchers to CardMatchers
    
    Change-Id: I05191400fc26e9b04f9c3845427f5defbfb33e90
    Jira-Id: CCAN-812

Author: Steve Kojder <skojder@twitter.com>
Date:   Thu Jun 5 16:46:08 2014 -0700

    Update cards coverage tests (includes interactivity refactor).
    
    Add new cards coverage tests for World Cup cards and add a new coverage test for
    the forward LeadGen card.
    
    Includes the following changes:
    * Add tests for the following cards:
      - forward:forward_world_cup_match
      - world_cup_match
      - forward:forward_world_cup_timeline
      - world_cup_timeline
      - forward:forward_promotion (aka forward LeadGen card)
    * Refactor test harness to allow for interactivity checks. This affects all
      existing tests
    * For world_cup_timeline cards, check to see that the search activity is
      launched when either the card preview image or summary text is clicked on
    * Fix forward_promo_image_app and promo_image_app CTA checks
    * Add some matchers to CardMatchers
    
    Change-Id: I05191400fc26e9b04f9c3845427f5defbfb33e90
    Jira-Id: CCAN-812

testPromoAppWithInstall.name: testPromoAppWithInstall
testPromoAppWithInstall.created_commit_log:
commit 2629430480971e42ad70e8dae9316dbc4e41bf31
Author: Steve Kojder <skojder@twitter.com>
Date:   Mon Jun 30 16:19:47 2014 -0700

    Update cards coverage tests.
    
    Includes the following updates:
    - Disable match status element check for world cup match cards
      (this is disabled on the server side, but may be enabled again later)
    - Use instrumentation target context, instead of instrumentation context
    - Incorporate improved activity monitor logic (copied from cards Echidna tests)
    - Reduce testing detail for revenue cards (revenue team tests for specifics)
    - Test for specific CTA state with promo_app cards
    - Fix revenue app_player CTA test
    
    Change-Id: Ifb68ab50888e3ed54046ff6c44cfd67e9d77d6fd

testPromotion.name: testPromotion
testPromotion.created_commit_log:
commit 2997d37b63b8c1b592b37c47c6b9a6bfc7813e03
Author: Steve Kojder <skojder@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed May 21 17:02:14 2014 -0700

    Implement basic cards UI smoke tests.
    
    Implement a basic suite of cards UI smoke tests. These tests look for a card
    to be visible and have non-zero size, for each type of first-party card that we
    support.
    
    Includes the following changes:
    * Add ElementHolder interface (to allow access of an Element via an Element
      view)
    * Simplify withElement() matcher to utilize ElementHolder
    * Add withNonZeroSize() View matcher
    * Add withClass() Element matcher
    
    Change-Id: Id3092a444f45686a2f3c16441d73939c7b32cf1d
    Jira-Id: CCAN-569

Author: Erika Chin <echin@twitter.com>
Date:   Fri Mar 21 11:52:32 2014 -0700

    Add tests for login challenges.
    
    Change-Id: I10bbfb6727af3df4a87a7b9280e8f5c28f1545d0
    Jira-Id: PRODSEC-2968
testOpenLoginChallenge.modified_commit_log:
commit a847f8a4dfbfced41c979881a848a62c87847546
Author: Jon Bettcher <jbettcher@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Apr 30 10:10:33 2014 -0700

    Refactor MockHttpServer
    
    This commit cleans up several things around mock http responses and the
    various Operations and Operation Clients.
    
    * MockHttpServer -> MockHttpClient
      The mock client was just proxying out to the server, eliminate the extra
      indirection
    * Split out the recording portions of MockHttpClient into a separate
      class.  RecordingHttpClient implements a standalone HttpClient
      capable of recording any requests that pass through it.  This keeps the
      mocking and recording operations separate concepts and provides a more
      logical recording implementation.
    * Delete MockCharlesHttpOperationClient. Allow the
      TestHttpOperationClientFactory to choose the underlying Operation
      Client (charles or apache)
    * Eliminate separate "load recordings" and "enable recordings" concepts
      in test implementations. Recording of new .http files will be controlled
      through a system property in a later commit. The MockHttpOperationClient
      uses a RecordingHttpClient as its base client if a recording prefix
      is specified.
    * Fix some tests to properly set up the TestHttpOperationClientFactory
      and reset the network stack on teardown
    
    Change-Id: I3059c7dac0c0f8975967eaba106958f485485830

    Adds support for commerce cards.
    
    * Adds parsing logic for commerce cards.
    * Implements commerce card view and click action logic.
    * Adds some scribing to the promotion card.
    * Also fixes a bug where tapping on the media image wouldn't launch the
    * photoviewer.

commit 0f5742ebdfc8cfd137908fbcf9109ac8792f0958
Author: Pavan Piratla <ppiratla@twitter.com>
Date:   Mon Mar 25 13:29:43 2013 -0700

    Adds automated coverage tests for various settings activities.
    
    This change is to add automated coverage for various low pri settings
    activities which lack functional coverage at this point. The test will
    open each of the activity, waits for it to load, verifies the title.
    
    This is to just to improve coverage of these activities on several
    devices and different languages. We will add functional tests for each
    of these activities later.
    
    Change-Id: Ia9f312d793e8c954c413c6fe119acf3c746a279a

commit c1c34c1a290404c3363d40c3f56d6b18ff4f08a6
Author: Park Kittipatkul <pkittipatkul@twitter.com>
Date:   Thu May 8 15:13:33 2014 -0700

    Reply experiments and drafts.
    
    Store extra information in draft table that is
    all users and selected users so that it can be
    restored when composing from draft.
    
    Also gracefully handle when we change experiment
    configuration.

    JIRA-ID: CONVO-1077
testFromDraftEmptySelectionToPublicConve.modified_commit_log:
commit b06f36704a6b3b2e0b87072688e0bb6a0dd72226
Author: Maricel Mihalcea <mmihalcea@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed May 28 15:56:24 2014 -0700

    Latent bug crash fix.
    
    There was a latent bug in the prefillReply logic.
    CR which exposes the bug: https://gerrit.twitter.biz/#/c/39793/
    More context: When replying, add yourself only if you are the first addressee.
    Said CR would add yourself regardless of your position in the list of addressees.
    Our (wrong) logic iterated over the original array and the newly formed string.
    
    Change-Id: Ifd8444aca6ec9f1f19eb75313931c87423d7632f
    Jira-Id: ANDROID-7722

testZeroRate.created_commit_log:
commit 2cf3d64de92c4e658f77b280bf8047a48e237a01
Author: Pavan Piratla <ppiratla@twitter.com>
Date:   Sun Jun 9 16:59:06 2013 -0700

    Adds a simple test for zero rate access.
    
    This change adds a test for zero rate access. In its setup, it sets the
    app to use zero rate access's twitter_test config. Then it opens up a
    tweet with media embedded, tries to open the media as well as a link
    embedded in the tweet. Finally, in the tear down, the test resets the
    zero rate access to normal, i.e TwitterAccess would be Off.
    
    Change-Id: I606eb9e24b347ae58e9961bdd4083f2ae90ae26f

testAccountSettingsActivity.created_commit_log:
commit 42039b35f3132b54c17505bb342e466fa7b9a74a
Author: Pavan Piratla <ppiratla@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Jan 23 10:01:08 2013 -0800

    Adds tests for AccountSettingsActivity.
    
    The tests verify the defaults under Account Settings, update account settings,
    verify that the settings have been updated, revert back the settings and
    verify that the settings have been reverted back to the
    original/defaults.
    
    The tests are also locale agnostic.
    
    Change-Id: Ifd8c6b3cb1cc73cc68cc279a10e5ef355b04063f
    Jira-Id: ANDROID-227

testSecuritySettingsBasesEnabledStateOnL.modified_commit_log:
commit d2e5629eab25ecc2324c52c4fc369ef1b9b44e15
Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Jun 18 01:53:17 2014 -0700

    Make the ensure user login setUp more customizable.
    
    Rename getUserNameToLogIn() from TwitterUiInstrumentationTestCase
    and TwitterActivityInstrumentation to getUsersToLogIn() and change
    the return type from String to List<TestAccount>. This allows tests
    the capability of ensuring that more than one test account is
    logged in.
    
    Introduce InitialLoginState enum and allow tests the capability of
    ensuring that all users are logged out during setUp().
    
    Change-Id: I14d239b8ed549a577c4109e4bb6b814f82acbdfe
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-414

Date:   Wed Jun 18 01:53:17 2014 -0700

    Make the ensure user login setUp more customizable.
    
    Rename getUserNameToLogIn() from TwitterUiInstrumentationTestCase
    and TwitterActivityInstrumentation to getUsersToLogIn() and change
    the return type from String to List<TestAccount>. This allows tests
    the capability of ensuring that more than one test account is
    logged in.
    
    Introduce InitialLoginState enum and allow tests the capability of
    ensuring that all users are logged out during setUp().
    
    Change-Id: I14d239b8ed549a577c4109e4bb6b814f82acbdfe
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-414

testClickHomeTweet.name: testClickHomeTweet
testClickHomeTweet.created_commit_log:
commit 2d60c75d1bf8057f0b23a83899af6c4d4d9962f2
Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Fri Feb 7 19:44:38 2014 -0800

    Add initial Espresso wrappers for interacting with Timeline Tweets.
    
    Added helper methods for tapping on a matched Tweet in
    Home and Discover.
    
    Tweets can be matched initially by content, if they're
    favorited, if they have a photo, or if they have a promotion.
    
    This change introduces the following classes:
    1. TwitterMatchers
       a. Custom non-View matchers.
       b. Meant to be used with Espresso's onData().
    2. TwitterDataInteractions
       a. Custom DataInteractions for interacting
          with Timeline Tweets.
       b. Initial supported Timelines: Home and Discover.
    3. TwitterAdapterViewProtocols
       a. Custom AdapterViewProtocols for automating
          against the RefreshableListViews.
       b. Adapts Cursors from the list adapters into
          Tweets as the AdaptedData.
    4. ItemAdapter interface
       a. HomeItemAdapter - adapts Cursor items from
          Home Timeline into Tweets.
       b. DiscoverItemAdapter - adapts Cursor items from
          Discover Timeline into Tweets. Still need to
          add support for adapting Users.
    
    Change-Id: Ie2e65a240b61d478e0e737deec02064d2297a805
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-120
testClickHomeTweet.modified_commit_log:

testActivitiesActivityDirectly.created_commit_log:
commit 50d9448bed83d895b71278c759692dd3c7464a6c
Author: Pavan Piratla <ppiratla@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Feb 13 08:57:13 2013 -0800

    Adds tests for ActivitiesActivity and ActivityDetailActivity.
    
    Also adds a template wrapper class for UI specific
    InstrumenationTestCase based tests. The main test opens up
    ActivitiesActivity and walks through the elements in the visible view
    and verifies if each of them is either a favorited item or a followed
    item. It also verifies the username and counts of each item inside the
    ActivityDetailActivity.
    
    Change-Id: I916d7900344774caaae797b1671c198e4d0a7ad7
testActivitiesActivityDirectly.modified_commit_log:
commit d2e5629eab25ecc2324c52c4fc369ef1b9b44e15
Author: Marcelo Hernandez <mhernandez@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Jun 18 01:53:17 2014 -0700

    Make the ensure user login setUp more customizable.
    
    Rename getUserNameToLogIn() from TwitterUiInstrumentationTestCase
    and TwitterActivityInstrumentation to getUsersToLogIn() and change
    the return type from String to List<TestAccount>. This allows tests
    the capability of ensuring that more than one test account is
    logged in.
    
    Introduce InitialLoginState enum and allow tests the capability of
    ensuring that all users are logged out during setUp().
    
    Change-Id: I14d239b8ed549a577c4109e4bb6b814f82acbdfe
    Jira-Id: MOBAUTO-414

testVerifyLoginErrorResponse.modified_commit_log:
commit a847f8a4dfbfced41c979881a848a62c87847546
Author: Jon Bettcher <jbettcher@twitter.com>
Date:   Wed Apr 30 10:10:33 2014 -0700

    Refactor MockHttpServer
    
    This commit cleans up several things around mock http responses and the
    various Operations and Operation Clients.
    
    * MockHttpServer -> MockHttpClient
      The mock client was just proxying out to the server, eliminate the extra
      indirection
    * Split out the recording portions of MockHttpClient into a separate
      class.  RecordingHttpClient implements a standalone HttpClient
      capable of recording any requests that pass through it.  This keeps the
      mocking and recording operations separate concepts and provides a more
      logical recording implementation.
    * Delete MockCharlesHttpOperationClient. Allow the
      TestHttpOperationClientFactory to choose the underlying Operation
      Client (charles or apache)
    * Eliminate separate "load recordings" and "enable recordings" concepts
      in test implementations. Recording of new .http files will be controlled
      through a system property in a later commit. The MockHttpOperationClient
      uses a RecordingHttpClient as its base client if a recording prefix
      is specified.
    * Fix some tests to properly set up the TestHttpOperationClientFactory
      and reset the network stack on teardown
    
    Change-Id: I3059c7dac0c0f8975967eaba106958f485485830

Author: Jon Bettcher <jbettcher@twitter.com>

    Refactor MockHttpServer
    
    This commit cleans up several things around mock http responses and the
    various Operations and Operation Clients.
    
    * MockHttpServer -> MockHttpClient
      The mock client was just proxying out to the server, eliminate the extra
      indirection
    * Split out the recording portions of MockHttpClient into a separate
      class.  RecordingHttpClient implements a standalone HttpClient
      capable of recording any requests that pass through it.  This keeps the
      mocking and recording operations separate concepts and provides a more
      logical recording implementation.
    * Delete MockCharlesHttpOperationClient. Allow the
      TestHttpOperationClientFactory to choose the underlying Operation
      Client (charles or apache)
    * Eliminate separate "load recordings" and "enable recordings" concepts
      in test implementations. Recording of new .http files will be controlled
      through a system property in a later commit. The MockHttpOperationClient
      uses a RecordingHttpClient as its base client if a recording prefix
      is specified.
    * Fix some tests to properly set up the TestHttpOperationClientFactory
      and reset the network stack on teardown
    
    Change-Id: I3059c7dac0c0f8975967eaba106958f485485830
